title: Top US Health Officials Say They Intend to Offer Other Nations Tech That Might Be Used Against Covid-19 - News18
content: Top US Health Officials Say They Intend to Offer Other Nations Tech That Might Be Used Against Covid-19  News18
description: Top federal health officials said Thursday that they intend to begin offering low- and middle-income nations access to the technology developed by government scientists that might be used to prevent or treat COVID-19. They did not specify which technologies might be included but hinted that the policy could eventually apply to the Moderna vaccine if the Biden administration wins a patent dispute with the company.
